amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate with regard to manned space flight.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2526 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2526 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12779) To express the sense of the Senate with regard to manned space flight.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2526 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2526 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Hutchison.
